## RemoteOptions type

Options for RemoteAccess class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RemoteOptions = {
    live: boolean;
    sync_direction?: SyncDirection;
    interval?: number;
    retry?: number;
    retry_interval?: number;
    auth?: RemoteAuth;
    behavior_for_no_merge_base?: BehaviorForNoMergeBase;
};
```
